roleset.name: instant message service via google/gmail

example.name: intransitive
example.text: do you see my photo when I 'm gchatting ? I just realized that it 's there for me , but not sure if it will show up for your through the bot

roleset.note: GCHAT-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. Relation to chat.01 (from gchat.01-v)
